Title: Implements combination lap safety and shoulder harness seat safety belts and requiring students use safety belts on school buses
Summary: Implements combination lap safety and shoulder harness seat safety belts; requires students use safety belts on school buses.
LawCode: Amd §§383 & 1229-c, V & T L; amd §3635-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the education law, in relation to implementing combination lap safety and shoulder harness seat safety belts and requiring students use safety belts on school buses
